channel.title: git on Software engineering notes
channel.description: Recent content in git on Software engineering notes

item.title: Git
item.description: add Add a new file or folder git add example.txt Add all untracked files and folders git add . branch 都不加 : 顯示 local branch -r : 顯示 remote branch -a : 顯示所有 branch (local + remote) -v : 顯示branch的詳細資料 --merged : 列出已經merge的branch --no-merged : 列出尚未merge的branch Rename branch git branch -m {old_name} {new_name} Rename current branch git branch -m {new_name} 刪除branch git branch -d developXD git branch -D {branch name} git branch —no-merged
